field.label: Enabled
field.help: If this AS-Path list should be enabled.

field.label: Description
field.help: Add an optional description for this AS-Path list.

field.label: Number
field.help: The ACL rule number (0-4294967294); keep in mind that there are no sequence numbers with AS-Path lists. When you want to add a new line between you have to completely remove the ACL!

field.label: Action
field.help: Set permit for match or deny to negate the rule.

field.label: AS
field.help: The AS pattern you want to match, regexp allowed (e.g. .$ or _1$). It's not validated so please be careful!
